Field Label: Record ID

The next few questions are about experiences that many people have had with using tobacco, including cigarettes, cigars, a pipe, snuff, or chewing tobacco. As I read each experience, please tell me if it has EVER happened to you as a result of using ANY of these types of tobacco.

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER.....
1.  More than once want to cut down on your tobacco use?
Did #1 happen in the last 12 months?
2. Give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure because tobacco use was not permitted at the activity?
Did #2 happen in the last 12 months?
3. Give up or cut down on activities that were important to you - like associating with friends or relatives or attending social activities - because tobacco use was not permitted at the activity?
Did #3 happen in the last 12 months?
4. Continue to use tobacco even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse?
Did #4 happen in the last 12 months?
5. Find yourself chain smoking/using one pinch or plug of snuff or chewing tobacco right after another?
Did #5 happen in the last 12 months?
6. More than once try to stop or cut down on your tobacco use but found you couldn't do it?
Did #6 happen in the last 12 months?

Many people experience problems on occasions when they stop or cut down on their tobacco use.

After stopping or cutting down on your tobacco use, did you EVER...
7a. Feel depressed
Did #7a happen in the last 12 months?
7b. Have difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep?
Did #7b happen in the last 12 months?
7c. Have difficulty concentrating?
Did #7c this happen in the last 12 months?
7d. Eat more than usual or gain weight?
Did #7d happen in the last 12 months?
7e. Become easily irritated, angry, or frustrated?
Did #7e happen in the last 12 months?
7f. Feel anxious or nervous?
Did #7f happen in the last 12 months?
7g. Feel your heart beating more slowly than usual?
Did #7g happen in the last 12 months?
7h. Feel more restless than usual?
Did #7h happen in the last 12 months?

CHECK ITEM 3.4: 

Are at least 2 items marked Yes in 7 a. - 7 h.?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes- Go to #7 i. | 2, No - skip to #8

Field Label: 7i.  You just mentioned that you had some experiences after stopping or cutting down on your tobacco use in the last 12 months. Were any of these experiences very uncomfortable or upsetting to you or did they cause problems in your life - like at work or school or with family or friends?
7j. Did you use tobacco in the last 12 months to keep from having any of these experiences?
8. Wake up in the middle of the night to use tobacco?
Did #8 happen in the last 12 months?
9. Often use tobacco just after getting up or shortly after getting up in the morning?
Did #9 happen in the last 12 months?
10. Find yourself using tobacco JUST AFTER being in a situation where tobacco use was not permitted - like after being on a plane, at a meeting, or shopping at the mall?
Did #10 happen in the last 12 months?
11. Find that you had to use much more tobacco than you once did to get the effect you wanted?
Did #11 happen in the last 12 months?
12. Increase your use of tobacco by at least 50 percent?
Did #12 happen in the last 12 months?
13. Have a period when you often used tobacco more than you intended to?
Did #13 happen in the last 12 months?
14. Continue to use tobacco even though it made you nervous, jittery, anxious, or depressed?
Did #14 happen in the last 12 months?
